meanings.definition: Chlorenchymas: the green tissue in plants that contains chloroplasts and is responsible for photosynthesis.
meanings.sent1: The chlorenchymas in the leaf help the plant make food through sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Plants rely on chlorenchymas to convert sunlight into energy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the chlorenchymas in the tree leaves were tiny green candies.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was so deep that she felt her heart was made of chlorenchymas, always seeking the light.
meanings.sent5: In the garden, the chlorenchymas danced joyfully under the warm sun, painting the world green.
